definition: to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column
to cut/to slash/to scratch (cut into the surface of sth)/to strike (a match)
to row/to paddle/profitable/worth (the effort)/it pays (to do sth)
to delimit/to transfer/to assign/to plan/to draw (a line)/stroke of a Chinese character

sentences.english: This paper analyses all kinds of possible situations of boundary for the reason of administrative division readjustment.
sentences.chinese: 分析了行政区划调整可能引起边界线变化的各种情况。

sentences.english: The name of the city area can not be used as a separate enterprise in the name of the administrative division.
sentences.chinese: 市辖区的名称不能单独用作企业名称中的行政区划。

sentences.english: The administrative division adjustments have brought a far-reaching impact for the development of Guangzhou metropolitan area.
sentences.chinese: 行政区划调整对广州大都市区的发展带来了重要影响。

sentences.english: Labor-dispute arbitration commissions shall not be set up level by level according to administrative divisions.
sentences.chinese: 劳动争议仲裁委员会不按行政区划层层设立。

sentences.english: A name of a district under a city may not be used separately as the administrative division in an enterprise name.
sentences.chinese: 市辖区的名称不能单独用作企业名称中的行政区划。

sentences.english: Five Bus become a concept of administrational divisions instead of laying emphasis on the significance of tribes.
sentences.chinese: 五部也不再强调部族的意义，而是成为行政区划概念。

sentences.english: An investigation of Prunus mume planting in Beijing districts is carried out for the first time.
sentences.chinese: 首次开展了北京行政区划内梅花栽植情况摸底调查。

sentences.english: The notarial offices are not established on different levels according to administrative hierarchy.
sentences.chinese: 公证机构不按行政区划层层设立。

sentences.english: Three Goraes area has a complicated condition of geographical features and district.
sentences.chinese: 三峡地区是一个复杂的地理和行政区划环境。

sentences.english: Administratively, the country is divided into counties.
sentences.chinese: 这个国家在行政区划分上分为许多郡。

sentences.english: These zones also follow administrative boundaries and extend beyond the 30 km radius.
sentences.chinese: 这些区域也以行政区划为界并超出30公里半径距离。

sentences.english: The labor dispute arbitration commissions shall not be established level by level according to administrative divisions.
sentences.chinese: 劳动争议仲裁委员会不按行政区划层层设立。

sentences.english: Regulate the administrative region with more energy; expand the scale of small town.
sentences.chinese: 加大力度对行政区划进行调整，扩大小城镇规模。

sentences.english: The Qing Dynasty further defined administrative divisions in Tibetan-inhabited areas.
sentences.chinese: 清朝中央政权更进一步明确了各藏区的行政区划。

definition: administrative unit (e.g. province 省[sheng3], prefecture 地區|地区[di4 qu1] or county 縣|县[xian4])
super-ministry system (reform aimed at streamlining government department functions)
municipality, namely: Beijing 北京, Tianjin 天津, Shanghai 上海 and Chongqing 重慶|重庆, the first level administrative subdivision/province level city/also called directly governed city
